10.categories: Crowdfunding, Finance, Financial Exchanges, Financial Services, FinTech

12.short_description: Decentralized Crowdfunding System

18.description:
Godzillion is a Decentralized Crowdfunding System, where people can vote, fund and exchange global startups on Blockchain.

Here, startups can present their project to a community that votes about let them initiate or not a crowdfunding campaign trough Godzillion. In order to be voted, startups put a reward that later will be distributed among all the people that vote on that startup. If the startup is positively voted,  the smart contract architecture creates his Startup Token (SUP), tokens that represent equity of the startup.

Once that the crowdfunding campaign starts, investors can participate in the funding process and once that the campaign ends, investors have a startup exchange available where they can buy or sell any SUP that had been funded trough Godzillion System.

All the process without commission in the entire platform.

12.short_description: Pagamobil launched the 1st Mobile Payments Platform in Mexico. Users are able to pay from Utilities or CableTV, to airtime for Mobiles

18.description: Pagamobil was launched by a team of entrepreneurs with more than 15 years of experience in Internet & ecommerce businesses and banking institutions in Mexico. Other successful startups launched by this group include eCommerce sites such as Decompras.com and Plazavip.com (Sold to Telefonica from Spain and Grup Carso, respectively). Pagamobil was launched to solve a very relevant problem: Most Mexicans have no control of their time. 80% of the population is Urban, work the longest hours in the OCDE, and have big families (+4 people per household).  In this complex environment, still more than 90% of Payments need to be settled in person. Pagamobil goes beyond convenience: We put Mexicans back in control and offer a convenient way to settle recurring payments.

10.categories: Health Care, Information Technology, Marketplace, Medical Device, Web Development

12.short_description: MedGlobal Group offers a technology-driven marketplace that facilitates the sale and purchase of medical devices, equipment, and products.

18.description:
MedGlobal Group (MGG) is an international marketplace for medical equipment, products, and services, and we publish a unique, fully interactive digital magazine named INSIGHTS.  MGG is a healthcare technology-based group out of Queretaro, Mexico, and we create and operate platforms serving the healthcare industry.  MGG is not new; we have been the largest marketplace platform for the health industry in LATAM since 2014 (previously ventasmedicas.com.mx).  MGGs new platform launched in May 2022 and now serves an international audience.
MGG uses the latest technology and provides tools and benefits unmatched in the industry.  
•	Latest technology – low bandwidth operation – fast operation
•	Full responsive to any platform
•	Multiple languages and currencies
•	True analytics
•	Simple navigation

MGG considers two competitors in the industry:
Dotmed – based in New York, built in 1999 using a third-party platform.  Dotmed is the largest in the industry; however, is reached a growth limit, and the lack of technology has created a complicated, overpriced, and undesirable platform.  User focus groups indicated that users disliked Dotmed but hesitated to move due to a lack of alternative quality platforms.
Bimedis – based in Ukraine, built using a third-party platform.  Bimedis mainly focuses on Europe and is not large.  Pricing and technology do not align with today.
About Insights Digital Magazine
MGG published the first ever fully interactive digital magazine – INSIGHTS.  Insights is not a PDF put into a website reader; Insights is a fully interactive, media-rich digital magazine designed so a reader wants to consume.  As MGG is the creator and developer of Insights, we have few limitations on creating unique content and advertising.  Unlike a PDF, Insights provides content in new ways by adding improved imagery, videos, audio, animations, attachments, direct lead generation, and more – as stated, we have few limitations.
Insights digital magazine does much more than PDF:
•	Latest technology
•	Unlimited reach
•	Fully responsive
•	Analytics for all pages
•	Customized content / unique branding opportunities
•	Coming soon – multiple languages
Audience
The audience for MedGlobal Group consists of healthcare decision-makers, administrators, purchasing agents, clinicians, product distributors, and product manufacturers in 121 countries.  Our newsletter/magazine subscriber base consists of 22,500 and growing.  Our platform received 300,000 visits, 1M pageviews, and since rebranding and relaunching in May 2022, we are scaling an average of 12-22% weekly.  MGG sees >40,000 events daily and has generated over 50,000 social media followers.
Future of MGG
MGG is always growing.  We recently received our first investment seed round and are adding team members to meet our growing demand.  Some new projects in production are an auction platform, advisory board, MGG Network, learning platform, and more.  We are proud to be part of the healthcare technology world.

12.short_description: Making IoT Technology accesible for All. Our Cloud solution makes easy to track, alert and manage measurement systems.

18.description:
We have a simple and robust hardware, which collets local variable data from sensors like temperature, humidity, pressure, etc. a sends it over wifi to our servers. The user can access the historical data on a web app from his computer or mobile device in any location and setup alerts which will be fired automatically based on several parameters to the users email.

Users are able to keep track of their productivity and storage variables and receive alerts in case something is out of the normal parameters.

Many markets will have enormous benefits by using this service reducing maintenance costs, lost of productivity and lost of stock. The most important market we work on is food supply and storage, although is easily adaptable to any production and supply market.

10.categories: Apps, Automotive, Collaborative Consumption, Real Time, Transportation

12.short_description: Trusted Journeys For Busy Families

18.description:
Aveeza grants parents the ability to connect with our school van drivers through our clever smartphone application for Android and iOS, to ensure their children always have a dedicated lift to and from school, as well as allowing parents to reserve a driver for any other transport needs as required.

Once a driver is chosen and accepted, then they are that driver for the child for the rest of the school year, and always making the pickup at their home at the same time in the mornings, and dropping them off at home again after school. Drivers can then supplement their income by providing their services for other transport needs outside of making the school run, like when a parent needs their child picked up from football practice after school, which is all managed by our application.

By seamlessly connecting 30,000 drivers ferrying more than 600,000 children twice a day in just Chile alone, with Aveeza, parents can also monitor the location of the vehicle that their child is on, and much more.

Aveeza is first-to-market with its technology and idea in Latin America, serving a USD$400 million market in Chile, and a USD$15 billion ecosystem throughout all of Latin America.

We are changing the game, and getting kids safely and cheaply to and from school every day, and given we have a maximum of 15 children per vehicle, we're also helping reduce traffic congestion.
